page.title: 15RELIGION
page.content: Chapels and Churches In our block there are three chapels and one church.The name of the chapels are Bethel,Nazareth and Tabernacl and the church is called St David's. {Bethel}(Congregational) is the largest chapel as regards size and number of members.{Bethel}was first built at 1803 but it has been enlargned and altered many times since then.There is a small vestry at the back and a graveyard at the front.At present there are 172 members and no Minister. {Nazareth}(Methodist) was first built at 1868.In 1905, columns were added to the front of the chapel,but in 1954 they had to be demolished because they were unsafe.The organ is in a loft high above the pulpit,but unlike Bethel and Tabernacl there is no gallery.There are 57 members here.
